entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening then changing to periods of rain mixed with snow late this evening. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High plus 5. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 March 2023
